string.value: #b#@1022007:##k in #b#m102000000##k has a favor to ask of you.
She says there are way too many Snails and would like you to eliminate 10 #rRed Snails#k and 10 #rBlue Snails#k.\n\nLet's report back to #b#m102000000##k in #b#m102000000##k upon completion.
You have swept out the Snails near #b#m102000000##k!

Snails are one of the weaker monsters, but there are simply too many of them.
I've tripped on a lot of them while walking around.

So I was wondering if you could reduce the number of Snails around here. What do you say?
Please eliminate 10 #rRed Snails#k and 10 #rBlue Snails#k.\nYou don't have to worry about where to find them, since they're everywhere.\nTo your left AND to your right!
I thought it was an easy mission. Is it too hard?
As I expected, this was a piece of cake for you.\nThanks to you, I see a lot fewer snails around.
